title: Nike Roshe One
description: The Nike Roshe One Women's Shoe is minimalist and versatile—intended to be worn with or without socks, dressed up or down, for walking or just taking it easy.
description_long: THE EPITOME OF EVERYDAY COMFORTThe Nike Roshe One Women's Shoe is minimalist and versatile—intended to be worn with or without socks, dressed up or down, for walking or just taking it easy.BenefitsTextile upper for a lightweight feelFoam sole for cushioningCushioned collar for protection around the ankleShown: Black/Dark Grey/BlackStyle: 844994-001Signature DetailsInspired by the practice of meditation and the concept of Zen, the Nike Roshe One epitomizes simplicity. It has no embellishments, just basic shoe necessities brought to life with every detail. Almost every part of the shoe reflects an aspect of a tranquil Zen garden: a modified Waffle outsole made to look like stepping stones, an insole that mirrors a raked rock garden, and slightly different midsole side lengths—a juxtaposition of seriousness and playfulness.
r_body: If you are thinking about ordering these for work!Don't! Especially if your on your feet for 9-12 hour's a day!

description_long: THE EPITOME OF EVERYDAY COMFORTThe Nike Roshe One Women's Shoe is minimalist and versatile—intended to be worn with or without socks, dressed up or down, for walking or just taking it easy.BenefitsTextile upper for a lightweight feelFoam sole for cushioningCushioned collar for protection around the ankleShown: Black/Dark Grey/BlackStyle: 844994-001Signature DetailsInspired by the practice of meditation and the concept of Zen, the Nike Roshe One epitomizes simplicity. It has no embellishments, just basic shoe necessities brought to life with every detail. Almost every part of the shoe reflects an aspect of a tranquil Zen garden: a modified Waffle outsole made to look like stepping stones, an insole that mirrors a raked rock garden, and slightly different midsole side lengths—a juxtaposition of seriousness and playfulness.
r_body: I love my new shoes , they are very comfortable and I got them at a good price . Thank you so much

description_long: THE EPITOME OF EVERYDAY COMFORTThe Nike Roshe One Women's Shoe is minimalist and versatile—intended to be worn with or without socks, dressed up or down, for walking or just taking it easy.BenefitsTextile upper for a lightweight feelFoam sole for cushioningCushioned collar for protection around the ankleShown: Black/Dark Grey/BlackStyle: 844994-001Signature DetailsInspired by the practice of meditation and the concept of Zen, the Nike Roshe One epitomizes simplicity. It has no embellishments, just basic shoe necessities brought to life with every detail. Almost every part of the shoe reflects an aspect of a tranquil Zen garden: a modified Waffle outsole made to look like stepping stones, an insole that mirrors a raked rock garden, and slightly different midsole side lengths—a juxtaposition of seriousness and playfulness.
r_title: Exactly what I was looking for
r_body: I've been wanting so classic Nikes since my other ones are about 5 years old. Very comfortable. Fits perfectly.

r_body: I was so excited about these shoes, but I’m kind of disappointed. They are cute so I’ll give them 2 stars but they are the least comfortable Nike’s I’ve ever owned. They are okay to wear for a little while but if I wear them for a few hours my feet ache. Oh well, I’ll stick to my reacts.

description_long: THE EPITOME OF EVERYDAY COMFORTThe Nike Roshe One Women's Shoe is minimalist and versatile—intended to be worn with or without socks, dressed up or down, for walking or just taking it easy.BenefitsTextile upper for a lightweight feelFoam sole for cushioningCushioned collar for protection around the ankleShown: Black/Dark Grey/BlackStyle: 844994-001Signature DetailsInspired by the practice of meditation and the concept of Zen, the Nike Roshe One epitomizes simplicity. It has no embellishments, just basic shoe necessities brought to life with every detail. Almost every part of the shoe reflects an aspect of a tranquil Zen garden: a modified Waffle outsole made to look like stepping stones, an insole that mirrors a raked rock garden, and slightly different midsole side lengths—a juxtaposition of seriousness and playfulness.
r_body: My mom love her shoes. She said they're so comfortable.

description_long: THE EPITOME OF EVERYDAY COMFORTThe Nike Roshe One Women's Shoe is minimalist and versatile—intended to be worn with or without socks, dressed up or down, for walking or just taking it easy.BenefitsTextile upper for a lightweight feelFoam sole for cushioningCushioned collar for protection around the ankleShown: Black/Dark Grey/BlackStyle: 844994-001Signature DetailsInspired by the practice of meditation and the concept of Zen, the Nike Roshe One epitomizes simplicity. It has no embellishments, just basic shoe necessities brought to life with every detail. Almost every part of the shoe reflects an aspect of a tranquil Zen garden: a modified Waffle outsole made to look like stepping stones, an insole that mirrors a raked rock garden, and slightly different midsole side lengths—a juxtaposition of seriousness and playfulness.
r_body: Cute and comfy. I like the way they fit and theyre comfortaboe when I'm on my feet all day at work.

description: The Nike Roshe One Women's Shoe is minimalist and versatile—intended to be worn with or without socks, dressed up or down, for walking or just taking it easy.
description_long: THE EPITOME OF EVERYDAY COMFORTThe Nike Roshe One Women's Shoe is minimalist and versatile—intended to be worn with or without socks, dressed up or down, for walking or just taking it easy.BenefitsTextile upper for a lightweight feelFoam sole for cushioningCushioned collar for protection around the ankleShown: Black/Dark Grey/BlackStyle: 844994-001Signature DetailsInspired by the practice of meditation and the concept of Zen, the Nike Roshe One epitomizes simplicity. It has no embellishments, just basic shoe necessities brought to life with every detail. Almost every part of the shoe reflects an aspect of a tranquil Zen garden: a modified Waffle outsole made to look like stepping stones, an insole that mirrors a raked rock garden, and slightly different midsole side lengths—a juxtaposition of seriousness and playfulness.

description_long: THE EPITOME OF EVERYDAY COMFORTThe Nike Roshe One Women's Shoe is minimalist and versatile—intended to be worn with or without socks, dressed up or down, for walking or just taking it easy.BenefitsTextile upper for a lightweight feelFoam sole for cushioningCushioned collar for protection around the ankleShown: Black/Dark Grey/BlackStyle: 844994-001Signature DetailsInspired by the practice of meditation and the concept of Zen, the Nike Roshe One epitomizes simplicity. It has no embellishments, just basic shoe necessities brought to life with every detail. Almost every part of the shoe reflects an aspect of a tranquil Zen garden: a modified Waffle outsole made to look like stepping stones, an insole that mirrors a raked rock garden, and slightly different midsole side lengths—a juxtaposition of seriousness and playfulness.
r_body: Love these! Very comfortable and cute. Easy to clean.

r_body: Excellent soft and flexible shoe for wide feet and problem feet with bunions/corns. Lightweight shoe that offers support for how I walk due to spinal cord injury. Worth the price!

Almost every part of the shoe reflects an aspect of a tranquil Zen garden: a modified Waffle outsole made to look like stepping stones, an insole that mirrors a raked rock garden, and slightly different midsole side lengths—a juxtaposition of seriousness and playfulness.
r_body: Love love love them! Very comfy and did well on their first day at the gym!

description_long: THE EPITOME OF EVERYDAY COMFORTThe Nike Roshe One Women's Shoe is minimalist and versatile—intended to be worn with or without socks, dressed up or down, for walking or just taking it easy.BenefitsTextile upper for a lightweight feelFoam sole for cushioningCushioned collar for protection around the ankleShown: Black/Dark Grey/BlackStyle: 844994-001Signature DetailsInspired by the practice of meditation and the concept of Zen, the Nike Roshe One epitomizes simplicity. It has no embellishments, just basic shoe necessities brought to life with every detail. Almost every part of the shoe reflects an aspect of a tranquil Zen garden: a modified Waffle outsole made to look like stepping stones, an insole that mirrors a raked rock garden, and slightly different midsole side lengths—a juxtaposition of seriousness and playfulness.
r_body: I bought these to wear as work shoes and I absolutely love them. They’re super comfy and have great support! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

description_long: THE EPITOME OF EVERYDAY COMFORTThe Nike Roshe One Women's Shoe is minimalist and versatile—intended to be worn with or without socks, dressed up or down, for walking or just taking it easy.BenefitsTextile upper for a lightweight feelFoam sole for cushioningCushioned collar for protection around the ankleShown: Black/Dark Grey/BlackStyle: 844994-001Signature DetailsInspired by the practice of meditation and the concept of Zen, the Nike Roshe One epitomizes simplicity. It has no embellishments, just basic shoe necessities brought to life with every detail. Almost every part of the shoe reflects an aspect of a tranquil Zen garden: a modified Waffle outsole made to look like stepping stones, an insole that mirrors a raked rock garden, and slightly different midsole side lengths—a juxtaposition of seriousness and playfulness.
r_body: My son keep recommending that I buy a pair. After forgetting my shoes at and needing a pair I grabbed these just because they where on sale. I would paid full price for them.....love them!! ??????

description: The Nike Roshe One Women's Shoe is minimalist and versatile—intended to be worn with or without socks, dressed up or down, for walking or just taking it easy.
description_long: THE EPITOME OF EVERYDAY COMFORTThe Nike Roshe One Women's Shoe is minimalist and versatile—intended to be worn with or without socks, dressed up or down, for walking or just taking it easy.BenefitsTextile upper for a lightweight feelFoam sole for cushioningCushioned collar for protection around the ankleShown: Black/Dark Grey/BlackStyle: 844994-001Signature DetailsInspired by the practice of meditation and the concept of Zen, the Nike Roshe One epitomizes simplicity. It has no embellishments, just basic shoe necessities brought to life with every detail. Almost every part of the shoe reflects an aspect of a tranquil Zen garden: a modified Waffle outsole made to look like stepping stones, an insole that mirrors a raked rock garden, and slightly different midsole side lengths—a juxtaposition of seriousness and playfulness.

description: The Nike Roshe One Women's Shoe is minimalist and versatile—intended to be worn with or without socks, dressed up or down, for walking or just taking it easy.

title: Nike Bella Kai
description: The Nike Bella Kai Thong delivers the underfoot comfort of dual-density foam in a casual thong, ideal for all-day wear in warm weather. Soft, lined straps provide a secure fit, while the herringbone texture on the footbed and outsole add grip instead of slip.
description_long: SPORTY, CASUAL COMFORT.The Nike Bella Kai Thong delivers the underfoot comfort of dual-density foam in a casual thong, ideal for all-day wear in warm weather. title: Nike Air Zoom Structure 22
description: The Nike Air Zoom Structure 22 Women's Running Shoe looks fast and feels secure. Engineered mesh, a heel overlay and dynamic support throughout the midfoot all work together to provide a smooth, stable ride.
description_long: LIGHTWEIGHT SUPPORT. SLEEK DESIGN.The Nike Air Zoom Structure 22 Women's Running Shoe looks fast and feels secure. Engineered mesh, a heel overlay and dynamic support throughout the midfoot all work together to provide a smooth, stable ride.BenefitsFlywire cables secure the top of your foot.Engineered mesh provides targeted ventilation and support.Dynamic Support provides a smooth, stable transition.Partial bootie wraps the foot for a snug, comfortable fit. Notches at the tongue provide easy on and off.Zoom Air unit in the forefoot delivers responsive, low-profile cushioning.Duralon blown rubber in the forefoot enhances cushioning.Product DetailsWeight: 8.9 oz. (women's size 8)Last: MR-10Offset: 10mm (12mm forefoot, 22mm heel)Shown: Black/Gridiron/WhiteStyle: AA1640-002
r_body: I love it! So comfortable and fashionable!

title: Nike Air Zoom Structure 22

description_long: LIGHTWEIGHT SUPPORT. SLEEK DESIGN.The Nike Air Zoom Structure 22 Women's Running Shoe looks fast and feels secure. Engineered mesh, a heel overlay and dynamic support throughout the midfoot all work together to provide a smooth, stable ride.BenefitsFlywire cables secure the top of your foot.Engineered mesh provides targeted ventilation and support.Dynamic Support provides a smooth, stable transition.Partial bootie wraps the foot for a snug, comfortable fit. Notches at the tongue provide easy on and off.Zoom Air unit in the forefoot delivers responsive, low-profile cushioning.Duralon blown rubber in the forefoot enhances cushioning.Product DetailsWeight: 8.9 oz. (women's size 8)Last: MR-10Offset: 10mm (12mm forefoot, 22mm heel)Shown: Black/Gridiron/WhiteStyle: AA1640-002
r_body: my 3rd pair

r_title: Sizing seems different from previous Zoom Structure models
r_body: I have been wearing Nike Structure shoes for years, starting with the Structure Triax and then the Zoom Structure models. I expected the 22 to fit similarly to the 21, but it seems larger. I have to tie the laces tighter to try to keep the shoe from slipping around my ankle. Even with double knotting it, the laces seem really long, and my ankle still slips. And the shoe just looks big Read More

description_long: LIGHTWEIGHT SUPPORT. SLEEK DESIGN.The Nike Air Zoom Structure 22 Women's Running Shoe looks fast and feels secure. Engineered mesh, a heel overlay and dynamic support throughout the midfoot all work together to provide a smooth, stable ride.BenefitsFlywire cables secure the top of your foot.Engineered mesh provides targeted ventilation and support.Dynamic Support provides a smooth, stable transition.Partial bootie wraps the foot for a snug, comfortable fit. Notches at the tongue provide easy on and off.Zoom Air unit in the forefoot delivers responsive, low-profile cushioning.Duralon blown rubber in the forefoot enhances cushioning.Product DetailsWeight: 8.9 oz. (women's size 8)Last: MR-10Offset: 10mm (12mm forefoot, 22mm heel)Shown: Black/Gridiron/WhiteStyle: AA1640-002
r_title: Great shoe, but the color selection...
r_body: I've been buying this model for awhile now as it is very comfortable yet provides good support as when I first started running my knees would pronate, so the support is good. My main complaint is that every time I go to buy they've changed the color selection and this time around, there's so much pink which I HATE. Please bring back some blues!! :) Or greens, or just more var Read More

r_title: Zoom 21's were perfect, these are terrible
r_body: The Zoom 21's fit perfectly and I owned several pairs.  These Zoom 22's have such a shallow heel area that I can nearly walk right out of them, even when I tie them tightly.

title: Nike Roshe G Tour
description: With a waterproof upper and removable spikes, the Nike Roshe G Tour Women's Golf Shoe is designed to help you outlast the weather. A plush midsole and synthetic leather upper offer lasting comfort from tee box 1 to the final green.
description_long: AN ICON REMADE FOR THE COURSE.With a waterproof upper and removable spikes, the Nike Roshe G Tour Women's Golf Shoe is designed to help you outlast the weather. A plush midsole and synthetic leather upper offer lasting comfort from tee box 1 to the final green.BenefitsWaterproof upper helps keep your feet dry.Foam midsole and sockliner give you soft cushioning.Internal heel counter helps keep your feet in place through your swing.Removable spikes deliver exceptional traction.Product DetailsSynthetic leather upperShown: Black/Summit White/Metallic Red BronzeStyle: AR5582-001
r_body: The tongue is too stiff and already rubs up against my ankle. I know I would not make it on the course all day with these. Other than that, I like the traditional style and sturdiness. Still returning it though.

r_body: I haven't had new golf shoes for 10 years and I am loving them. Just need to break them in, they are little stiff.

r_body: I like the fit and comfort of these shoes. You can’t feel the cleats when you are walking on concrete cart paths, but they help grip the grass when you walk up hills. The shoes are easy to clean.

title: Nike SFB Field 2 8"
description: The Nike SFB Field 2 8” is a lightweight high-performance boot designed to support heavier loads in all theaters. The sole is equipped with an aggressive tread pattern that provides exceptional traction over challenging terrain, while an internal rock shield helps prevent punctures.
description_long: BUILT FOR THE TACTICAL ATHLETE.The Nike SFB Field 2 8” is a lightweight high-performance boot designed to support heavier loads in all theaters. The sole is equipped with an aggressive tread pattern that provides exceptional traction over challenging terrain, while an internal rock shield helps prevent punctures.BenefitsSynthetic leather and nylon canvas provide durability and breathability.Dual-zone lacing integrates with locking eyelets to help keep your forefoot cinched down–even when the laces are loose at the collar.Foam midsole gives you lightweight cushioning.Internal rock shield helps prevent punctures and reduce pressure.TrailFrame with TPU heel shank adds stability for heavier loads.Aggressive outsole pattern offers solid traction on a variety of rugged surfaces.Sticky rubber lugs on the forefoot and sawtooth design at the arch provide additional grip.Product DetailsPerforations at sides and collarReinforced toe stitchRemovable sockliner8” collarHeel pull tabWeight: 20 oz (men’s size 10.5)Shown: Desert/DesertStyle: AO7507-200SFB OriginsThe SFB collection honors Nike co-founder Bill Bowerman and his WWII service. Upon his return, he became the head track and field coach at his alma mater, the University of Oregon, where he began creating high-performance footwear for his athletes. Just like Bowerman, everything in the SFB collection is field-proven and dedicated to athletes.
r_body: So far the boots are comfortable I had the older version once there broken in there awesome I gave a 4 star based on the quality of the last pair could improve the stitching.

Upon his return, he became the head track and field coach at his alma mater, the University of Oregon, where he began creating high-performance footwear for his athletes. Just like Bowerman, everything in the SFB collection is field-proven and dedicated to athletes.
r_body: My job is to walk (at a “brisk” pace LoL) for 10+ hours a day.  I got these boots specifically for work, and I love them.  Very comfortable, not bulky or heavy, it feels like I’m wearing a pair sneakers.

r_body: I have had mine for 3 years.   Best boots I've owned.  Thinking about buying a back up pair as soon as I get some extra cash.  You could easily run in them, for a boot, and people always compliment me on them.  Always shocked to find out they are Nike.

description: The Nike SFB Field 2 8” is a lightweight high-performance boot designed to support heavier loads in all theaters. The sole is equipped with an aggressive tread pattern that provides exceptional traction over challenging terrain, while an internal rock shield helps prevent punctures.
description_long: BUILT FOR THE TACTICAL ATHLETE.The Nike SFB Field 2 8” is a lightweight high-performance boot designed to support heavier loads in all theaters. The sole is equipped with an aggressive tread pattern that provides exceptional traction over challenging terrain, while an internal rock shield helps prevent punctures.BenefitsSynthetic leather and nylon canvas provide durability and breathability.Dual-zone lacing integrates with locking eyelets to help keep your forefoot cinched down–even when the laces are loose at the collar.Foam midsole gives you lightweight cushioning.Internal rock shield helps prevent punctures and reduce pressure.TrailFrame with TPU heel shank adds stability for heavier loads.Aggressive outsole pattern offers solid traction on a variety of rugged surfaces.Sticky rubber lugs on the forefoot and sawtooth design at the arch provide additional grip.Product DetailsPerforations at sides and collarReinforced toe stitchRemovable sockliner8” collarHeel pull tabWeight: 20 oz (men’s size 10.5)Shown: Desert/DesertStyle: AO7507-200SFB OriginsThe SFB collection honors Nike co-founder Bill Bowerman and his WWII service. Upon his return, he became the head track and field coach at his alma mater, the University of Oregon, where he began creating high-performance footwear for his athletes. Just like Bowerman, everything in the SFB collection is field-proven and dedicated to athletes.
r_body: They are so comfy at work and water proof. I’m a security guard so on my daily activity I have to stand for eight hours Or patrol for 8 hours a big campus. I have A broken toe so this make so much of a difference. My feet don’t hurt at the end of the day like before with regular warehouse boot

r_title: From the hills of green to the sea of blue, are you with me, you ole sailor you!!
r_body: Bought these a year ago. I got them to survive Ireland. Green hills, bogs, the Irish Sea, Guinness all over, and many a miles, there an back again! These shoes have made the test of time. Legit got better as I wore them. Soft comfortable, light! Durable!!! Flexible!!!! And water proof to a certain extant (knee deep in some serious bog)! None the Read More

title: Nike SFB Field 2 8” Realtree® GORE-TEX
description: Built for the outdoor enthusiast, the Nike SFB Field 2 8” Realtree® GORE-TEX is a lightweight high-performance boot made with durable leather and breathable canvas for all-day comfort. Its rubber outsole has an aggressive traction pattern that optimizes support and stability on unpredictable terrain, while the Realtree® camo helps you blend in to your surroundings.
description_long: DURABLE DESIGN OUTFITTED FOR STEALTH.Built for the outdoor enthusiast, the Nike SFB Field 2 8” Realtree® GORE-TEX is a lightweight high-performance boot made with durable leather and breathable canvas for all-day comfort. Its rubber outsole has an aggressive traction pattern that optimizes support and stability on unpredictable terrain, while the Realtree® camo helps you blend in to your surroundings.BenefitsRealtree® camo pattern helps you blend in to wilderness environments.GORE-TEX inner sleeve provides waterproof protection and breathability.Full-grain leather and nylon canvas provide durability and airflow.Dual-zone lacing integrates with locking eyelets to help keep your forefoot cinched down–even when the laces are loose at the collar.Foam midsole gives you lightweight cushioning.Internal rock shield helps prevent punctures and reduce pressure.TrailFrame with TPU heel shank adds stability for heavier loads.Aggressive outsole pattern offers solid traction on a variety of rugged surfaces.Sawtooth design at the arch enhances grip for fast roping.Sticky rubber lugs on the forefoot provide additional grip.Product Details400G Thinsulate® insulationPerforations at sides and collarRemovable sockliner8” collarHeel pull tabWeight: 24 oz (men’s size 10.5)Shown: Dark Hazel/BlackStyle: AQ1203-200SFB OriginsThe SFB collection honors Nike co-founder Bill Bowerman and his WWII service. Upon his return, he became the head track and field coach at his alma mater, the University of Oregon, where he began creating high-performance footwear for his athletes. Just like Bowerman, everything in the SFB collection is field-proven and dedicated to athletes.

r_title: The Best Boot of all TIME.
r_body: I have a bad back and work construction and it gets cold where I work.  This boot helps with all of that.  It has good traction, it's warm, comfortable and it looks tough.  It's the best boot I've bought for work.  Period.  It's nearly perfect.  A reinforced toe area with a carbon fiber toe box, and a slightly more rugged outer mid-sole and this bo Read More

r_body: Amazing overall boot! Lasted 14 months before they inevitably tore because my job in the Army is hard on them. I wore them through rain, snow, deep mud, ruck marches, on top of heavy machinery and through other various terrain. Took about 3-5 days to break in and wore them to work every single day. I can’t wear them in uniform anymore since one Read More

r_title: Comfortable but doesn’t feel like walking on clouds/ Runs Big/ Light but bulky
r_body: I ordered these boots in my size because I thought they fit true to size but they came and they were to big. I exchanged them for 1/2 size smaller and still to big! I’m disappointed with how big the sizing runs. Besides that the boots are comfortable but the heel does fold inward and it takes some wearing in.

r_title: Very durable but not so comfortable
r_body: I bought these pair because Nike discontinued manufacturing "Nike Special Field Men's Boot".  I've had 3 pairs of the first generation Nike boots in the past and loved them so much.  The first gen boots were very light, super comfortable (almost didn't have to break in and could start running in them immediately), and stylish.  Everyone around me  Read More

r_body: Not happy at all. Got these 2 weeks before deployment, just got to where I need to be and the loops that hold the laces in place broke, not only 1 but 2 of them broke at different occasions. Will not be purchasing nike boots again.

r_body: Loved the first two generations of the SFB. They were light, comfortable, relatively affordable, and they saw me through years of service. The new design has a thick and uncomfortable heel cup, bulky padding around the instep and ankle, and slow eyelets that require thinner la Read More

r_body: This version of the SFB boot is just ok. It seems to be better served in a cold climate. I am regular army Infantry and wear the Nike SFB boot every day. I prefer the original version and fortunately I have two pair. I use the Jungle version for use in the field. Please offer the original again.

r_body: I ordered these boots as a more sturdy option than the other SFB's offered. Box arrived in a timely manner for APO, fit was amazing, very little break-in, comfortable from day one. Fast forward 4 months of almost everyday use, and the top eyelets on one boot wore through, and they other are about to give out as well. Really disappointing considering the price, and that I was also looking at getting a second pair. Also, It is extremely inconvenient to send them back at my current location, but will update when I do send them back.

r_body: I've been wearing the original sfb since 2015 and they are amazing.  I'm comparing this style to the original so this review is a bit biased.  Also, I dont do any tactical activities with boot, I just need them for the uniform.  Immediately, I was drawn back by how bulky it was and less flexible than the first nike sfb.  The latest style is CV comfortable compared to most military boots but doesnt come close to original sfb.  Loses 1st star because it's that true on cloud feeling like most would say. The second loss star is due to the lacing.          The main problem here is the tightness around the plastic eyelet and the ease to quickly tie and untie. Like I said earlier, I'm completely comparing these to the first sfb.  Nike needs to bring those back for the non tactical military.

r_title: Satisfied the the new style of SFB boot.
r_body: These new boots are awesome and definitely worth the money if you are wondering about getting a pair.Comfortable right out of the box. I’m in 13B AIT currently for artillery training at Fort Sill, Oklahoma and these boots make like a whole light easier. Will definitely be buying a second pair of these boots, they look good and they are comfortable. NIKE IS THE BEST.

r_body: I've been looking for a good ruck boot since the old Oakley boots.  The good news is these boots run lighter than the Oakleys, feel just as comfortable, and so far no hot spots.  I think Nike hit the right balance between comfort and support.  Durability remains to be seen.  The tread is good; no skids/slips so far.

r_title: Really Well Made, Uncomfortable in Some Aspects
r_body: First off, I am very impressed with the styling of the boot. Although, in the military, functionality is much more important.CONS: My major gripe is that the point where the harder leather meets the other fabric in the heel creates a protrusion that digs into my heel. I could see this as eventually working out but its even making marks and small tears on my socks. The upper lace area is pretty stiff compared to previous versions. Next, the center lace points where the plastic piece is also causes minor discomfort. If you have the laces tight, substantial enough keep your foot in place, those eyelets create an extra pressure point that dig into your feet some.The sizing seems to be 1 whole size below what I typically get in any Nike shoe. For instance, I wear a size 10 in tennis shoe, bought the boots in 9.5 but for the length of the sole, I probably need a 9. I worry tightness would be an issue if I got the size down in return.PROS:The styling, comfortably of the inserts, and construction/durability.

title: Nike SFB Gen 2 8" GORE-TEX®
description: The Nike SFB Gen 2 8” GORE-TEX® is a lightweight, waterproof tactical boot designed for speed and flexibility in challenging conditions. Inspired by Nike Free technology, the flexible sole is equipped with an aggressive traction pattern for multi-surface grip and an internal rock shield to help prevent punctures.
description_long: SECOND GENERATION PROTECTION.The Nike SFB Gen 2 8” GORE-TEX® is a lightweight, waterproof tactical boot designed for speed and flexibility in challenging conditions. Inspired by Nike Free technology, the flexible sole is equipped with an aggressive traction pattern for multi-surface grip and an internal rock shield to help prevent punctures.BenefitsGORE-TEX® inner sleeve provides waterproof protection and breathability.Polishable synthetic leather and nylon canvas provide durability and airflow.Dual-zone lacing integrates with a durable webbing system for enhanced stability and a locked-in fit.Foam midsole gives you lightweight cushioning.Internal rock shield helps prevent punctures and reduce pressure.Rubber outsole with reinforced heel strike zone offers durable traction on a variety of surfaces.Shallow flex grooves are anatomically placed to let your foot move naturally while preventing debris from sticking.Sawtooth design at the arch provides additional grip.Product DetailsOutsole inspired by Nike Free technology200G Thinsulate® insulationRemovable sockliner8” collarHeel pull tabWeight: 24 oz (men’s size 10.5)Shown: Black/BlackStyle: 922472-002SFB OriginsThe SFB collection honors Nike co-founder Bill Bowerman and his WWII service. Upon his return, he became the head track and field coach at his alma mater, the University of Oregon, where he began creating high-performance footwear for his athletes. Just like Bowerman, everything in the SFB collection is field-proven and dedicated to athletes.

r_title: A great pair of boots definitely worth the money.
r_body: Just a little background: I'm a former combat medic for the US Army and during that time, all I wore was boots for a few years daily. So that's the POV. With that said, THIS IS GREAT BOOT!!! r_body: I just logged 3 miles on sidewalk and field terrain on a very stormy PNW day. Pros: my feet stayed dry, I walked in puddles up to 6inches deep, no leaks. The boots will break in quickly. Tacticool look. Good traction. No pinch points. Sole is firm. Cons: With good traction, comes lots of retained mud. No speed eyelets, Read More

r_title: If your thinking of buying boots and you thought of nike boots THIS IS THE ONE
r_body: After a couple months of wearing these boots I've found them to be absolutely worth buying. I've walked in rain, snow,freezing temperatures, etc and have not been disappointed. although when they get wet or are in snow for to look it does make your feet feel cold but its not something to complain about.

title: Nike Shox Gravity
description: The Nike Shox Gravity Unisex Shoe features striking columns in the heel that deliver resilient cushioning for all-day, everyday comfort.

r_body: Amazing comfort, and I like the slip-on lacing style. However, the cage was bothersome to the inside of my feet as it was pushing against the ball of the ankle area. Wish the soles were more durable, but comfort and support is good.

title: Nike SFB Gen 2 8"
description: Made with durable nylon canvas and synthetic leather, the Nike SFB Gen 2 8” is a lightweight tactical boot designed for speed and flexibility over rough terrain. Inspired by Nike Free technology, the flexible sole is equipped with an aggressive traction pattern for multi-surface grip and an internal rock shield to help prevent punctures.
description_long:
SECOND GENERATION PROTECTION.Made with durable nylon canvas and synthetic leather, the Nike SFB Gen 2 8” is a lightweight tactical boot designed for speed and flexibility over rough terrain. Inspired by Nike Free technology, the flexible sole is equipped with an aggressive traction pattern for multi-surface grip and an internal rock shield to help prevent punctures.Benefits
Synthetic leather and nylon canvas provide durability and breathability.
Dual-zone lacing integrates with a durable webbing system for enhanced stability and a locked-in fit.
Metal screen vents on the medial side help keep your foot cool.
Reinforced stitch and rubber at the toe add durability.
Foam midsole gives you lightweight cushioning.
Internal rock shield helps prevent punctures and reduce pressure.
Rubber outsole with reinforced heel strike zone offers durable traction on a variety of surfaces.
Shallow flex grooves are anatomically placed to let your foot move naturally while preventing debris from sticking.
Sawtooth design at the arch provides additional grip.

Product Details
Outsole inspired by Nike Free technology
Removable sockliner
8" collar
Heel pull tab
Weight: 16.4 ounces (men’s size 10.5)Shown: Sage/Sage/SageStyle: 922474-200

SFB OriginsThe SFB collection honors Nike co-founder Bill Bowerman and his WWII service. Upon his return, he became the head track and field coach at his alma mater, the University of Oregon, where he began creating high-performance footwear for his athletes. Just like Bowerman, everything in the SFB collection is field-proven and dedicated to athletes.
r_body: I got this for work and the are very comfortable.   Walking/running - from indoor, office work to outdoor field setting these are a very comfortable boot. However after only a couple months the toe of both boots has worn dramatically. I was excited for these to be used long term but I am already looking to get Read More

description: Made with durable nylon canvas and synthetic leather, the Nike SFB Gen 2 8” is a lightweight tactical boot designed for speed and flexibility over rough terrain. Inspired by Nike Free technology, the flexible sole is equipped with an aggressive traction pattern for multi-surface grip and an internal rock shield to help prevent punctures.
description_long:
SECOND GENERATION PROTECTION.Made with durable nylon canvas and synthetic leather, the Nike SFB Gen 2 8” is a lightweight tactical boot designed for speed and flexibility over rough terrain. Inspired by Nike Free technology, the flexible sole is equipped with an aggressive traction pattern for multi-surface grip and an internal rock shield to help prevent punctures.Benefits
Synthetic leather and nylon canvas provide durability and breathability.
Dual-zone lacing integrates with a durable webbing system for enhanced stability and a locked-in fit.
Metal screen vents on the medial side help keep your foot cool.
Reinforced stitch and rubber at the toe add durability.
Foam midsole gives you lightweight cushioning.
Internal rock shield helps prevent punctures and reduce pressure.
Rubber outsole with reinforced heel strike zone offers durable traction on a variety of surfaces.
Shallow flex grooves are anatomically placed to let your foot move naturally while preventing debris from sticking.
Sawtooth design at the arch provides additional grip.

Product Details
Outsole inspired by Nike Free technology
Removable sockliner
8" collar
Heel pull tab
Weight: 16.4 ounces (men’s size 10.5)Shown: Sage/Sage/SageStyle: 922474-200

SFB OriginsThe SFB collection honors Nike co-founder Bill Bowerman and his WWII service. Upon his return, he became the head track and field coach at his alma mater, the University of Oregon, where he began creating high-performance footwear for his athletes. Just like Bowerman, everything in the SFB collection is field-proven and dedicated to athletes.
r_body: Excellent field boots, worth the $$$. Like walking in clouds.

title: Nike SFB Gen 2 8"
description: Made with durable nylon canvas and synthetic leather, the Nike SFB Gen 2 8” is a lightweight tactical boot designed for speed and flexibility over rough terrain. Inspired by Nike Free technology, the flexible sole is equipped with an aggressive traction pattern for multi-surface grip and an internal rock shield to help prevent punctures.
description_long:
SECOND GENERATION PROTECTION.Made with durable nylon canvas and synthetic leather, the Nike SFB Gen 2 8” is a lightweight tactical boot designed for speed and flexibility over rough terrain. Inspired by Nike Free technology, the flexible sole is equipped with an aggressive traction pattern for multi-surface grip and an internal rock shield to help prevent punctures.Benefits
Synthetic leather and nylon canvas provide durability and breathability.
Dual-zone lacing integrates with a durable webbing system for enhanced stability and a locked-in fit.
Metal screen vents on the medial side help keep your foot cool.
Reinforced stitch and rubber at the toe add durability.
Foam midsole gives you lightweight cushioning.
Internal rock shield helps prevent punctures and reduce pressure.
Rubber outsole with reinforced heel strike zone offers durable traction on a variety of surfaces.
Shallow flex grooves are anatomically placed to let your foot move naturally while preventing debris from sticking.
Sawtooth design at the arch provides additional grip.

Product Details
Outsole inspired by Nike Free technology
Removable sockliner
8" collar
Heel pull tab
Weight: 16.4 ounces (men’s size 10.5)Shown: Sage/Sage/SageStyle: 922474-200

SFB OriginsThe SFB collection honors Nike co-founder Bill Bowerman and his WWII service. Upon his return, he became the head track and field coach at his alma mater, the University of Oregon, where he began creating high-performance footwear for his athletes. Just like Bowerman, everything in the SFB collection is field-proven and dedicated to athletes.

r_title: Boots Have A Long Break In Period

After they broke in, they finally started to feel great. If you hav Read More

r_title: A huge disappointment compared to their other boots
r_body: I have always been a fan of Nike's tactical footwear but so far this model has not lived up to the standards of their other boots. I have taken their older models many environments over multiple years and I still have them today. However with the SFB Gen 2's I have only owned them for about 8 months and they are already tearing in multiple areas. Definitely disappointed and would not purchase another pair.  I hope that the next model is improved upon because I still enjoy their other products, it just seems as if there wasn't the same amount of effort put into these boots compared to other versions. This issue is happening to everyone that I know that owns these boots.

r_body: These boots are awesome.  I purchased the Nike SFB Gen 2 8" Leather coyote brown over a year ago and they are still as comfortable as when I purchased them and look great.  I work in an office and go to the field about 5-6 days 11 months out of the year and 30 days straight 1 month and no issues.  I have recommended to multiple friends and coworkers and will purchase again.

title: Nike SFB Gen 2 8" Leather
description: DA PAM 670-1 compliant, the Nike SFB Gen 2 8” Leather is a lightweight tactical boot designed for speed and flexibility over rough terrain. Inspired by Nike Free technology, the flexible sole is equipped with an aggressive tread pattern for multi-surface traction and an internal rock shield to help prevent punctures.
description_long:
SECOND GENERATION PROTECTION.DA PAM 670-1 compliant, the Nike SFB Gen 2 8” Leather is a lightweight tactical boot designed for speed and flexibility over rough terrain. Inspired by Nike Free technology, the flexible sole is equipped with an aggressive tread pattern for multi-surface traction and an internal rock shield to help prevent punctures.
Benefits
Full-grain leather and nylon canvas provide durability and breathability.
Dual-zone lacing integrates with a durable webbing system for enhanced stability and a locked-in fit.
Foam midsole gives you lightweight cushioning.
Metal screen vents on the medial side help keep your foot cool.
Reinforced stitch and rubber at the toe add durability.
Internal shank in the heel adds stability.
Rubber outsole with reinforced heel strike zone offers durable traction on a variety of surfaces.
Shallow flex grooves are anatomically placed to let your foot move naturally while preventing debris from sticking.
Sawtooth design at the arch enhances grip for fast roping.

Product Details
DA PAM 670-1 compliant
Outsole inspired by Nike Free technology
Removable sockliner
8" collar
Heel pull tab
Weight: 16.8 oz (men’s size 10.5)Shown: Coyote/Coyote/CoyoteStyle: 922471-900

SFB OriginsThe SFB collection honors Nike co-founder Bill Bowerman and his WWII service. Upon his return, he became the head track and field coach at his alma mater, the University of Oregon, where he began creating high-performance footwear for his athletes. Just like Bowerman, everything in the SFB collection is field-proven and dedicated to athletes.
r_body: Awesome boot at first but these boots will not last long.  I work in an office 90% and somehow the shoe is ripping apart.

title: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Low Top
description: You need a style to rely on. The Chuck Taylor All-Star is a staple: the high-top and oxford silhouettes stay simply classic, while the white laces and star ankle patch give a nod to the legacy of the Chuck. This is the go-with-everything go-to that you won’t get sick of going to. Stock up.
description_long: YOUR ICONYou need a style to rely on. The Chuck Taylor All-Star is a staple: the high-top and oxford silhouettes stay simply classic, while the white laces and star ankle patch give a nod to the legacy of the Chuck. This is the go-with-everything go-to that you won’t get sick of going to. Stock up.BENEFITSDurable canvas you know and loveOutsole pattern for traction (makes sure you don’t fall and eat it)Star logo patch says you get itSilhouette looks good, has been good for decades, will be good tomorrow, etc.Shown: NavyStyle: M9697-410CHUCK TAYLOR ALL STAR ORIGINSCreated in 1917, the Converse Chuck Taylor All-Star has been evolving for a hundred years while managing to keep it classic: a canvas upper, all-star emblem, and vulcanized rubber sole are known all over the world. The silhouette stays true in both high-top and oxford styles: both looks can handle whatever.
r_body: Comfortable & look great with great arch support! I highly recommend!

title: Nike SFB Jungle
description: Designed for comfort and durability in wet conditions, the Nike SFB Jungle features breathable canvas and water-drainage ports in the midsole. The outsole is equipped with an aggressive traction pattern and internal Kevlar layer for multi-surface grip and puncture protection.
description_long: DURABLE DESIGN WITH WATER MANAGEMENT.Designed for comfort and durability in wet conditions, the Nike SFB Jungle features breathable canvas and water-drainage ports in the midsole. The outsole is equipped with an aggressive traction pattern and internal Kevlar layer for multi-surface grip and puncture protection.BenefitsPorts and metal screens for water drainage and protection from punctures.Rubber outsole gives you fast-roping durability.Aggressive pattern for great traction on soft surfaces.Pebax® plate on bottom moderates flexibility and stability.Internal Kevlar layer protects against punctures and decreases pressure on the bottom of the foot.Product DetailsCanvas upperDrop-in midsoleShown: Baroque Brown/Medium Olive/Baroque BrownStyle: 631372-222SFB OriginsDuring World War II, Nike Co-Founder Bill Bowerman served as a member of the 10th Mountain Division in Italy. Upon his return, he became the head track and field coach at his alma mater, the University of Oregon. It was there that he honed a gift for creating high-performance footwear for his athletes. This boot is a realization of both of Bowerman's worlds.

title: Nike SFB Jungle 8" Leather

This boot is a realization of both of Bowerman's worlds.

title: Nike SFB Jungle 8" Leather
description: DA PAM670-1 compliant, the Nike SFB Jungle is designed to keep you comfortable in wet conditions with breathable canvas and water-drainage ports in the midsole. The outsole is equipped with an aggressive traction pattern and internal Kevlar® layer that helps protect from punctures and provide multi-surface grip.
description_long: DURABLE DESIGN WITH WATER MANAGEMENT.DA PAM670-1 compliant, the Nike SFB Jungle is designed to keep you comfortable in wet conditions with breathable canvas and water-drainage ports in the midsole. The outsole is equipped with an aggressive traction pattern and internal Kevlar® layer that helps protect from punctures and provide multi-surface grip.BenefitsFull-grain leather and nylon canvas provide durability Lateral and medial ports for water drainage.Pebax® plate on bottom moderates flexibility and stability.Internal Kevlar® layer helps protect against punctures and decreases pressure on the bottom of the foot.Aggressive outsole pattern provides solid traction on rugged surfaces.Durable Rubber saw-tooth design in arch of outsole adds grip for fast roping.Product DetailsDA PAM670-1 compliantDrop-in midsoleDrainage portsShown: Coyote/CoyoteStyle: 828654-900SFB OriginsDuring World War II, Nike Co-Founder Bill Bowerman served as a member of the 10th Mountain Division in Italy. Upon his return, he became the head track and field coach at his alma mater, the University of Oregon. It was there that he honed a gift for creating high-performance footwear for his athletes. This boot is a realization of both of Bowerman's worlds.
r_body: Feels big in the front from using Nike runners, thats expected from shoes to boots.Insoles are huge so keep what they put in the boot.SFB 1 gen are discontinued so these are close. Definitely an upgrade. These feel like silk if you're used to Nike boots. Good arch support,  Read More

r_body: I bought these boots a few months ago and was impressed right away. They are slightly beefier than the previous SFB, which was a must. These boots have withstood a fair amount of abuse in the quick 3 months I've worn them. From day to day running around to rucking 12 miles with a 45lb pack these boots are still holding up well.My one concern with these boots is the insole. It is still holding up well, and maybe it's just me, but the time will come sooner or later to replace it. I cannot find a replacement available for purchase from Nike. It's unique design makes me worry about any third party replacement I might find. Overall this is a fantastic boot. I look forward to many more miles in them.

r_body: Bought these because I had to buy new boots, AR 670-1. Loved the canvas ones and wore them for 4 years. Still going strong. But these are horrid. The leather across the top pinches and squeezes the top of my foot at the base of my toes not allowing any movement. Meanwhile, my heels bounce around and slide up and down. The blisters are amazing. Theres a weird gap thing going on at the fourth lace where theres a larger space in between the third and fourth laces and the leather bunches and puffs out. Theyre also cut differently in that one spot and the leather is stitched together in a freehanging bit of suede. The little triangles of leather the design makes jut outs and looks silly. These HURT and look terrible. No reason to buy these. Move along and good luck!

r_body: Bought these to replace my heavy, clunky basic training issue boots. Size selection was the same as any other Nike product I've purchased. One surprise was the extra width in the toe pocket. I have wide feet and have come accustomed to purchasing shoes in 2E width but the normal width of the size 12 boot was a perfect fit for my foot. Excellent arch support as I have higher than average arches. No noticeable fatigue after being on the hanger floor all day. I find myself wearing them on the weekends because they're comfortable and look great with a pair of jeans. Will definitely be purchasing another pair when this one becomes worn.

r_body: Ive had them for about 8 months now and am 6 months into my deployment and they have held up great. They are very comfortable even at the end of 12 hours no matter what I might be doing. Ive had a lot of boots with soul separation issues and these have held up beautifully. The rubber the soles are constructed of and nice and firms and dont wear away easily and have very aggressive traction.

description: DA PAM670-1 compliant, the Nike SFB Jungle is designed to keep you comfortable in wet conditions with breathable canvas and water-drainage ports in the midsole. Upon his return, he became the head track and field coach at his alma mater, the University of Oregon. It was there that he honed a gift for creating high-performance footwear for his athletes. This boot is a realization of both of Bowerman's worlds.
r_body: I have been wearing the previous color version (green/brown) for eight months now almost every day. I purchased these after Nike made good on my warranty claim for the SFB Field boots I had previously that started coming apart after six weeks. These have proven to be lightweight yet well constructed, durable boots. I am in the construction industry so they are worn on job sites every day. The fit is slightly larger than the Nike athletic shoe sizing, maybe a 1/4 to a 1/2 size larger, probably for wearing thicker socks with them. I ordered mine a 1/2 size smaller and the fit is perfect. One of the best features of the boot is the tongue design. It keeps the boots from getting filled with small debris. The issues I would like to see corrected with these in a future update is the comfort of the heel cup when not standing. When wearing these with thinner socks, the heel cup digs into the foot above the heel when driving or seated and is very uncomfortable. Wearing thicker socks mitigates this, but when the weather is hot, thick socks quickly overheat in these boots. I experienced the heel cup discomfort with the SFB Field as well. The other issue I have had with them is that one of the insoles has partially delaminated with causes a ridge under the ball of my foot/toes when not standing (driving/seated). It flattens back out when standing. As far as I can tell, replacement insoles are not available.I would definitely buy these again, especially if they go on sale, but I would like to see some further refinement. They have become one of the best pair of boots I have ever worn. I highly recommend the SFB Jungle over the SFB Field. Both are great looking boots but the Jungle actually performs where the Field fails.

title: Nike Celso Girl
description: The Nike Celso Girl Flip-Flop offers soft cushioning and easy style. Its synthetic nubuck strap is plush and smooth, while a foam footbed offers comfort.
description_long: BAREFOOT STYLE AND COMFORT.The Nike Celso Girl Flip-Flop offers soft cushioning and easy style. Its synthetic nubuck strap is plush and smooth, while a foam footbed offers comfort.BenefitsFlip-flop style offers easy on and off.Synthetic nubuck strap is durable and flexible.EVA midsole cushions each step.Outsole features Phylon foam for cushioning.Swoosh design on the strap gives a sporty finish.Shown: Black/WhiteStyle: 314870-011
r_body: I just bought my 4th pair in 10 years.  I've worn these to Disneyland all day and my feet don't get sore. These are always my go-to sandals.  If I could give 10 stars...I totally would :)
